modName: No Blur and Fix Eye Adjustment
summary: This mod removes the blur associated to shouts, powers (including NightEye), taking damage, and magic. Also Eye Adjustment has been reduced in strength so there is no more annoying bloom and constant adjusting when moving from light to dark areas.
descriptionHtml:
This mod removes the blur associated to shouts, powers (including NightEye), taking damage, and magic. Also Eye Adjustment has been reduced in strength so there is no more annoying bloom and constant adjusting when moving from light to dark areas.

NOTE: This does not remove any blurring caused by DOF, I can change that as well in the future if people want it.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------
Steam Workshop Link
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=8619

------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Just added a Standalone mod for the Bloom/Eye Adjustment 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12314
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=9995

Standalone mod for No Blur (includes DOF)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12316
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=15242

Enjoy and please leave any comments/requests below.
author: PhilBro
